content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://www.lumosity.com/ https://assets.lumosity.com; script-src https://www.lumosity.com/ https://assets.lumosity.com; frame-src https://www.lumosity.com/ https://assets.lumosity.com; style-src 'unsafe-inline'
description: Take a quick Lumosity break and exercise your brain!
name: Lumosity Break
